tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genes (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name STRING,
    go_annotation STRING
)
CREATE TABLE genes (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(255), gene_description TEXT, gene_function VARCHAR(255), gene_process VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE annotations (annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, annotation_text TEXT, annotation_type VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE functions (function_id INT PRIMARY KEY, function_name VARCHAR(255), function_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE processes (process_id INT PRIMARY KEY, process_name VARCHAR(255), process_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE gene_process_mapping (mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, process_id INT)
